extendedIngredients.name: bone in skin on chicken breasts
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 bone-in skin-on split chicken breasts (6 to 8 ounces each)

extendedIngredients.name: carrots
extendedIngredients.originalString: 7 carrots, peeled and cut into 2-inch sticks

extendedIngredients.name: parsnips
extendedIngredients.originalString: 7 parsnips, peeled and cut into 2-inch sticks

extendedIngredients.name: whole garlic
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 whole heads of garlic, broken into unpeeled cloves, plus three cloves, minced

recipes.title: Dinner Tonight: Garlic-Roasted Chicken with Carrots and Parsnips

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc are my top picks for Chicken. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. The Buddha Kat Winery Chardonnay with a 4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 25 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Buddha Kat Winery Chardonnay
productMatches.description: We barrel ferment our Chardonnay and age it in a mix of Oak and Stainless. Giving this light bodied wine modest oak character, a delicate floral aroma, and a warming finish.

recipes.instructions: Procedures                                                                              1                                                                            Preheat oven to 400째F. Line sheet pan with aluminum foil and spread out chicken skin side up, carrots, parsnips, and garlic cloves in single layer.  Drizzle everything with olive oil, then sprinkle evenly with salt, pepper, and thyme leaves. Rub chicken pieces with minced garlic.                                                                                                                            2                                                                            Transfer sheet pan to oven and roast until chicken registers 155째F on instant read thermometer and vegetables are tender, about 40 minutes, basting the chicken with the pan juices and tossing the vegetables once or twice during cooking. Cooking time may vary depending on size of chicken breasts. Monitor closely and add or subtract time as necessary.  Allow chicken to rest 10 minutes after removing from oven and serve immediately with roasted vegetables.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 400째F. Line sheet pan with aluminum foil and spread out chicken skin side up, carrots, parsnips, and garlic cloves in single layer.
Drizzle everything with olive oil, then sprinkle evenly with salt, pepper, and thyme leaves. Rub chicken pieces with minced garlic.

Transfer sheet pan to oven and roast until chicken registers 155째F on instant read thermometer and vegetables are tender, about 40 minutes, basting the chicken with the pan juices and tossing the vegetables once or twice during cooking. Cooking time may vary depending on size of chicken breasts. Monitor closely and add or subtract time as necessary.  Allow chicken to rest 10 minutes after removing from oven and serve immediately with roasted vegetables.
